title: The law and equity of the gospel, or, The goodness of our Lord as a legislator delivered first from the pulpit in two plain sermons, and now repeated from the press with others tending to the same end ... by Thomas Pierce ...
author: Pierce, Thomas, 1622-1691.
publisher: Printed by S. Roycroft for Robert Clavell ...,
notes: Includes [2] p. of advertisements at end.
